episodes.name: Switch
episodes.overview: Jimmy and Kim's relationship takes a new turn. Mike decides it's for the best to sever his affiliation with an unrestrained associate.

episodes.name: Cobbler
episodes.overview: To keep a potentially messy situation from unraveling, Mike brokers a deal. Jimmy works to exonerate an eccentric client.

episodes.name: Amarillo
episodes.overview: Jimmy's client outreach efforts thrive, and he exhibits new heights of showmanship. Mike is perplexed by daughter-in-law Stacey's troubling news.

episodes.name: Gloves Off
episodes.overview: Jimmy's actions unexpectedly create waves for Kim. Mike cautiously weighs a lucrative proposal that might bring about dire consequences.

episodes.name: Rebecca
episodes.overview: Jimmy becomes frustrated with his restrictive work environment. Kim pulls out all the stops to dig herself out of a seemingly bottomless hole at HHM.

episodes.name: Bali Ha'i
episodes.overview: Jimmy finds comfort in familiarity. Kim receives a life-changing proposal. When he is threatened, Mike finds himself pushed to the limit.

episodes.name: Inflatable
episodes.overview: Mike's growing frustration shows when his hand is forced, but with Jimmy's help, he works to keep the peace. Meanwhile, Jimmy boldly forges a new path forward.

episodes.name: Fifi
episodes.overview: Mike aims to settle the score with an enemy; an unexpected opportunity presents itself to Jimmy.

episodes.name: Nailed
episodes.overview: Mike takes a methodical approach to his mission. Someone questions Chuck's capabilities. Jimmy faces a personal dilemma.

episodes.name: Klick
episodes.overview: Jimmy must make a hard choice. Mike takes control of matters. Hamlin delivers shocking news.
